Dialogue (en): All the equipment being repaired is GOOOOOOOONE~~
All my magical tools have disappeared;;
It seems the market was completely robbed by thieves!
Why does my store look like this?
Pass the forest and the desert
Then we’ll find the Ice Mountain
The monsters have become violent lately
Specific slimes shoot liquid. Watch out!!
Died.. Because he couldn’t double jump..OTL

Dialogue (kr): 보라색 마나를 다 모으면 W키로 체력을 회복할 수 있다.
Dialogue (en): You can press W to recover your health If you collect all the purple mana!
I’m a good monster. Please don’t hit me.
Do you want to retrieve the weapons?
What!? Are you the guy who stole my weapons?
Yeah. But I will not give you that.
Where are the rest of my weapons?
Your weapons is in the desert.
If you want to find your weapons
you have to find desert's gunman.
It reminded me of that time… when I use the sword.
A special attack is possible if you right-click
But you need your mana orbs!
What happens if I gather 3 mana orbs?

Dialogue (kr): 나한테 마우스를 조준하고 패링 연습을 해보세요!
Dialogue (en): Try aiming the mouse at me and practicing parrying!
let’s move to the right if you’ve practiced enough
If I hit them at the timing when the monsters is about to attack…
I am too boring waiting for you.
Give me my weapons right NOW!!
Do you really think I will give this weapons simply?
Gun and sword… What is the best weapon..?
Is this really the power of the ordinary weapon merchant?
I heard that guy names 'Zacchi' have the weapon.
He lives in bing kong ice mountain..!
Eventually I have to go final destination now…
You can attack while moving with the gun

Dialogue (kr): 하지만 몇번 쏘면 장전을 해줘야 하지.
Dialogue (en): But you need to reload after a few shots.
Now you have more than two weapons

Dialogue (kr): 연계 스킬을 사용 할 수 있어
공격하는 잠깐의 타이밍에 무기 교체를 해주면?
Dialogue (en): If you switch weapons at the moment of attack

Dialogue (kr): 연계 스킬이 나가니까 적재적소에 활용해야 해
Dialogue (en): You can use combo skills.. So you need to utilize them appropriately

Dialogue (kr): 단단한 얼음은 총알로는 부술 수 없다.
Dialogue (en): Solid ice cannot be broken with bullets.
(O.<) Do you really think you win this battle..?

Dialogue (kr): 우리의 목적은 대마왕의 부활을 막는 것
Dialogue (en): Our true goal is blocking devil's resurrection.
We need many strong weapons for our goal.
So your village was first target.
And your case has the same reason.
The king has sealed the devil in the past. Right..?
Do you really think the king will release the devil?
But the king is planning on releasing the devil in secret.

Dialogue (kr): 지금의 왕은 더이상 과거의 영웅이 아니거든..
Dialogue (en): The current king wasn't a hero in the past.
Finally I gathered all the weapons!
The hammer is slow but can deal strong attacks
I want to meet the king.

Dialogue (kr): 지금은 성에 아무도 들어갈 수 없다.
Dialogue (en): No one can enter the gate!
Didn't I say that anyone can't enter..?
I guess my knights betrayed me...

Dialogue (kr): 뭐.. 아무래도 좋아.. 세상은 곧 끝나거든..!
Dialogue (en): Emm.. Never mind.. The world will end soon.

Dialogue (kr): APO.. 설마 나와 싸우러 온 건가..?
Dialogue (en): APO.. Are you here to fight?
I'm your best friend. Isn't it..?

Dialogue (kr): 차라리 나와 함께 세상을 멸망시키는게 어때?
이후 치열한 공방이 오가며 싸움은 끝나게 되는데
Dialogue (en): The battle was ended when Apo knock down Kai.
When you think it’s all over with Kai’s death.
And taunted me to follow him…
Do you really intend to break the seal!?

Dialogue (kr): Yeah. 이제 이 봉인석만 뜯어내면 모든게 끝난다.
Dialogue (en): Yeah. Once I remove this seal stone, everything will end.
But the seal stone is now gone..!

Dialogue (kr): 이번에야말로 이 대마왕 Glint님께서 손수 세상을 멸해주마..!!
Dialogue (en): I am the Great Demon Lord Glint. Now I will destroy the world..!!
Huh..? Are you.. the hero in the past..?!

Dialogue (kr): 아니. 널 쓰러뜨리러 온 무기 상인 APO다.
Dialogue (en): No. I am APO, the weapon merchant. I've come here to knock you down!

Dialogue (kr): 크하하하하!! 용사도 아닌 너가 날 무슨 수로 쓰러뜨리지!?
Dialogue (en): Hahahaha!! You can't beat me. You're even not a hero.
Nope. I win. Because I have 3 legendary weapons!
I revived over a long time…
Because now I am stronger than anyone!

Dialogue (kr): 크흐흐.. 하지만 아직 싸움은 끝나지 않았다.
Dialogue (en): Ha…!? but the fight isn’t over yet.
Argh… the battle is my defeat…?
